name: apple_app_store_search
description: Scrape app names, supported platforms (e.g. iOS App Store Support), release notes, etc. in an easy-to-understand JSON format.

term.description: Parameter defines the query you want to search. You can use any search term that you would use in a regular App Store search. (e.g. Coffee)

num.description: Parameter defines the number of results you want to get per each page. It defaults to 2. Maximum number of results you can get per page is 200. Any number greater than maximum number will default to 200.

page.description: Parameter is used to get the items on a specific page. (e.g., 0 (default) is the first page of results, 1 is the 2nd page of results, 2 is the 3rd page of results, etc.).

device.description: Parameter defines the device to use to get the results. It can be set to desktop to use a Mac App Store, tablet to use a iPad App Store, or mobile (default) to use a iPhone App Store.

api_key.description: Parameter defines the SerpApi private key to use.

name: apple_product_search
description: Scrape the results from Apple Product search engine via SerpApi service.

product_id.description: Parameter defines the product id you want to search. You can use the specific id of a product that you would like to get the product page of.  You can find the ID of a product from App Store API json results. You can also get it from the URL of the app.

type.description: Parameter defines the type of Apple Product to get the product page of. It defaults to app.

api_key.description: Parameter defines the SerpApi private key to use.

history.description: Whether to include version history of the product. Default: False.

also_like.description: Whether to include "you may also like" block of the product. Default: False.

more_by_this_developer.description: Whether to include "more by this developer" of the product. Default: False.

name: apple_reviews_search
description: Scrape the results from Apple Reviews search engine via SerpApi service.

product_id.description: Parameter defines the ID of a product you want to get the reviews for. You can find the ID of a product from App Store API json results. You can also get it from the URL of the app.

page.description: Parameter is used to get the items on a specific page. (e.g., 1 (default) is the first page of results, 2 is the 2nd page of results, 3 is the 3rd page of results, etc.).

limit.description: Number of reviews to return per call. Default: 3.

offset.description: Number of reviews to skip in the page. Default: 0.

sort.description: Parameter is used for sorting reviews for the iOS App Store (iPhone and iPad). It can be set to: mostrecent: Most recent (default), mosthelpful: Most helpful, mostfavorable: Most favorable, mostcritical: Most critical. This parameter has no effect on the macOS App Store. Reviews from the macOS App Store will always be sorted from most recent to least recent.

api_key.description: Parameter defines the SerpApi private key to use.

name: ask_to_user
description: You can ask user for guidance when you think you need more information to handle the task, but you should use this tool as less as you can.

question.description: The question you want to ask to user.

name: finish
description: Finish the task and give your answer.
